name: Probably Science
bio: Comedians whose bachelors degrees in STEM fields are currently gathering dust take you through the week in science. Incompetently. Featuring Matt Kirshen, Andy Wood, sometimes Jesse Case, sometimes Brooks Wheelan and special guests from the word of comedy, and occasionally science.
